trans-unit.source: Defines methods that decrypt an XrML <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Define métodos que descifran un elemento XrML <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.IRelDecryptor> interface with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> class to decrypt an XrML `<encryptedGrant>` element.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.IRelDecryptor> interactúen con el <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> clase para descifrar un XrML `<encryptedGrant>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to validate an XML digital signature using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.IRelDecryptor> interface and the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo validar una firma digital XML utilizando el <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.IRelDecryptor> interfaz y la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> clase.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" /> object that encapsulates the algorithm used for XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" /> que encapsula el algoritmo utilizado para cifrado XML.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo" /> object that contains an asymmetric key to use for decryption.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo" /> que contiene una clave asimétrica que se va a utilizar para descifrado.

trans-unit.source: A stream object that contains an <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" /> element to decrypt.
trans-unit.target: Objeto de secuencia que contiene un elemento <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" /> para descifrar.

trans-unit.source: Decrypts an XrML <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" /> element that is contained within a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Descifra un elemento XrML <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" /> contenido dentro de un objeto <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object that contains a decrypted <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> que contiene un elemento <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" /> descifrado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.IRelDecryptor.Decrypt%2A> method decrypts an XrML `<encryptedGrant>` element and returns a plaintext stream.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.IRelDecryptor.Decrypt%2A> método descifra un XrML `<encryptedGrant>` elemento y devuelve una secuencia de texto simple.
